sub_title: üí•Internal Recruiter at Futurewhiz, recruiting for our products - Squla, WRTs, Scoyo and Studiraüí• Certified B Corp.üí•
summary:
‚ú®I started out at The Frank Recruitment Group (agency), where I played a key role building the .NET market in South Africa (with a predominant focus on Cape Town.) Fast forward a few years, and we had countless happy people, fulfilled in their new roles across Cape Town, Johannesburg, Port Elizabeth, Durban and Stellenbosch.

I‚Äôve recruited within Agency, and Internal settings for both profit, and non profit Health-Tech and Ed-Tech companies, in fast paced, scale up environments.  

üåéI've recruited across South Africa, The Netherlands, Ethiopia, Portugal, Germany, Kenya, Burkina Faso, and India, working on graduate to C-suite positions.  Often I‚Äôve had a heavy a focus on helping tech specialists, though in the recent years, I've recruited for a combination tech, operations, finance and Marketing positions.

Happiest when supporting and guiding candidates and hiring managers, to ensure a seamless, memorable hiring experience.üòä

‚úîÔ∏èA 100% human centric recruiter, looking after recruitment for our Ed-tech platforms Squla, WRTs, Scoyo and Studira
